column1: Smoque BBQ////The peach cobbler was in a different league altogether
column2: however. My wife is a big cobbler person
column3: and she was ga-ga. I thought the crust
column4: while not your typical cobbler crust
column5: was better than anything I have ever put in my mouth as part of a cobbler
column6: and the peach stuff tasted like fresh peaches (a little tart
column7: not too mushy); cannot ask for much more in this arena (unless it would be to make it cherry cobbler - if they had cherry cobbler to compare to the peach
